Text:
You need to upgrade to a modern bit torrent client such as uTorrent or Vuze.

The old BitComet crap you are using is obsolete.
Utterly useless Torrent. 4/20 songs, 1 Seeder (with good reason) and shitty BitComet Bullshit. Don't Bother.

I have uTorrent (latest version) and it has "padding" files that says if you see this, you need bitcomet.

Only 4/20 songs are actually able to be downloaded.

20% of the actual songs, and using an outdated client. 

Bravo on your pathetic torrent!
